data.title: How to register in Pennsylvania
data.meta_description: Find out how to register to vote, check your registration, get deadlines, and more for Pennsylvania
data.text:
How to register and update your registration

Start or update your registration on Pennsylvania’s election website.

You can also register to vote by mail or in person on Pennsylvania’s election website.

Voter registration deadlines

Voter registration deadlines for the Tuesday, November 5, 2024 election. Find state and local election dates.

Online registration deadline: Monday, October 21, 2024

Register by mail deadline: Must be received by Monday, October 21, 2024

In person registration deadline: Monday, October 21, 2024

How to check your voter registration
